title: Petty Thieves Plague San Francisco. ‘These Last Two Years Have Been Insane.’ - The Wall Street Journal
content:
1. Petty Thieves Plague San Francisco. ‘These Last Two Years Have Been Insane.’  The Wall Street Journal
  2. How a San Francisco remodel turned into an epic nightmare involving city red tape, squatters and cops shrugging off crime  San Francisco Chronicle
  3. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Small-business owners have been hit particularly hard by burglaries and property damage. They say the costs of security and repairs are eating into profits already diminished by the pandemic.
